feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: This feature supports the Structured Metrics Metamodel (SMM) standard of the OMG. SMM allows to define, represent and exchange both measures and measurement information related to any structured information model, such as the OMG Meta Object Facility (MOF) standard, defining an XMI interchange format between metrics extraction tools.
